welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sangereng, Indonesia, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches, rich culture, and delicious cuisine. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that our city has to offer and enjoy your stay with us.

restaurants.name: Lot 9 Bintaro
restaurants.description: Lot 9 Bintaro is a indonesian restaurant located in Tangerang.
restaurants.address: Jl Bintaro Utama No 78, Sektor 9 (Seberang Anita Salon), Tangerang, Banten

restaurants.name: Intro Jazz Bistro&Cafe
restaurants.description: Intro Jazz Bistro&Cafe is a bistro located in BSD City, Tangerang Selatan.
restaurants.address: Sunburst Cbd Lot II/18C (Jl.Boulevard BSD Timur), BSD City, Tangerang Selatan, Banten 15310

restaurants.name: McDonald's
restaurants.description: McDonald's is a fast food restaurant located in South Tangerang.
restaurants.address: BSD Sunburst CBD Office Park II 18 (Jl. BSD Grand Boulevard), Tangerang, Banten, Banten 15327

restaurants.name: Sushi Tei
restaurants.description: Sushi Tei is a sushi restaurant located in Tangerang.
restaurants.address: The Breeze (Jl. Grand Boulevard BSD Timur), Tangerang, Banten

restaurants.name: AJ Bakery & Cake
restaurants.description: AJ Bakery & Cake is a bakery located in Tangerang Selatan.
restaurants.address: Ruko Melati Mas Square Blok A2 No. 21-23 (Jalan Raya Serpong - BSD City), Tangerang Selatan, Banten

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pondok Cabe Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Pondok Cabe Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Soekarno-Hatta International Airport, serving domestic and international flights of various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Soekarno-Hatta International Airport, serving domestic and international flights of various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Soekarno-Hatta International Airport, serving domestic and international flights of various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may have limited speed and coverage.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Halim Perdana Kusuma Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Halim Perdana Kusuma Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.
